definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Drag-racing drivers deserve to be punished for putting the innocent at risk.
sentences.chinese: 飆車司機把無辜行人置於危險境地，理應受罰。

sentences.english: Finally, have more leisure education and guidance to speeding juveniles at criminal correction institutions.
sentences.chinese: 重視矯正機關飆車少年之休閒教育輔導。

sentences.english: Had been out riding a motorcycle rear-end accident while drag racing.
sentences.chinese: 曾經騎摩托車飆車時出過追尾事故。

sentences.english: What do you think about those members of the motorcycle racing clan?
sentences.chinese: 你對那些飆車族成員有什麼看法？

definition: to make a detour/to take the long route
the road one must follow or take/the only way/same as 必由之路[bi4 you2 zhi1 lu4]
to start/to set in motion/to move/to march/to dig in (eating)/to tuck in (eating)
to go round a curve/to turn a corner/fig. a new direction
to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down
to catch the wind/to go for a spin in the fresh air
